What are the four steps leading to U.S. troops facing chemical weapons on the battlefield if we don't respond to Assad's use?

If we don’t respond to Assad’s use of chemical weapons, then Assad’s regime will continue using them with impunity (1). This will effectively erode the ban on chemical weapons (2). If the ban on chemical weapons erodes, other tyrants will be more likely to attain and use them (3). Other tyrants attaining and using chemical weapons will make U.S. troops more likely to face them on the battlefield (4).
